alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lee, northwestern Clarendon and central Sumter Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sumter County Airport, or near Sumter, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sumter, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Mulberry, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Elliott, Mayesville, Lynchburg, Cane Savannah, Ashwood, Oswego, Dalzell, Manville, Brogdon, Lakewood, East Sumter, St. Charles, Cherryvale and Woodrow. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 114 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
